couponTitle: Hertz Coupon: Get 1 Day Free Rental for Every 7+ Days Booked
couponDescription: Get ready to save on your current adventure. Use this coupon code and get an entire day free when you book for 7 days or more. With Hertz.com, your journey just got a whole lot more affordable.

couponTitle: Hertz Coupon: Get 1 Day Free When You Rent an EV
couponDescription: Hit the open road with style and savings. We're excited to offer you 1 day free when you rent an EV with Hertz. Whether you're planning a cross-country adventure or simply need a ride for your weekend getaway, their promo code will help you save on top-quality rentals.
